data.eml:eml: Characidium longum (Characiformes: Crenuchidae), a new fish from Venezuela.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Donald C. Taphorn B., Carmen G. Montaña, Paulo Buckup (2006): Characidium longum (Characiformes: Crenuchidae), a new fish from Venezuela. Zootaxa 1247: 1-12, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:F99D64F7-B265-4031-B8F0-79077CF808F2
